law.catch_line: Unless authorized under this title to provide pilotage, a person may not represent to the public, by...
law.text: Unless authorized under this title to provide pilotage, a person may not represent to the public, by use of a title, including "pilot", "bay pilot", "licensed pilot", "State licensed pilot", or "Maryland pilot", by description of services, methods, or procedures, or otherwise, that the person is authorized by the State to provide pilotage.
